```{r}
library(fs)
library(quarto)

quarto_file <- "code/dashboard-modules/README.qmd"

capture.output(quarto_render(quarto_file), type = "message")

original_file <- "code/dashboard-modules/README.md"
new_file <- "code/dashboard-modules/dashboard-intro.md"

if (fs::file_exists(new_file)) {
  fs::file_delete(new_file)
}

if (fs::file_exists(original_file)) {
  fs::file_copy(original_file, new_file)
}
```
